name: Monkey Driver
description:
Monkey Driver 

A monkey has stolen the city bus! Get the remaining passengers to their destinations as fast as possible, without causing too much damage.

The monkey has a set of controls that he will randomly choose from.

Drag & drop the controls from the menu onto the bus to affect what the monkey can choose from. Once you are close to the stops, eject the passengers to get them off the bus! Be quick to get a high score!


Lovingly made by Dana Shaklya, Joshua Strutt, and Julianna Clarke  ♥
